attributes.action: Extend conditions for essential travel to Europe.
attributes.additional_details: Any loss or damage to property will impact financial situation and ultimately spend within the UK. Undermine relations between the UK and Spain for continued tourism.
attributes.background: Approval to visit holiday home (Spain) to make sure everything is secure and habitable after not being able to visit for a year.  Ensure that additional security is in place if unable to visit due to extended COVID restrictions in coming months.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580858
